Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{2: 'Liv, check on Karen.', 3: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Because we don't have access authority to her M.I.N.D., we'll have to brute force it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "A form of energy is trying to invade Karen's M.I.N.D.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I currently cannot discern its constituents... but this energy is overloading her M.I.N.D. and causing it to overheat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If this goes on, Karen might...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Immediately call Celica for help!', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes, Commandant... B-but Karen's situation requires immediate attention as well!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What do we need to do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Like I said, I cannot discern the properties of that energy. But at the very least, her M.I.N.D. must be cooled off first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We need to help Karen's frame sleep to temporarily pause her M.I.N.D., then wait for support or help.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But the issue is that, even though I've been externally sending in sleep commands, that energy is disrupting its execution.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is there no other way?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "There is, but it's a risky choice.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The situation is dire. Even if it has high risk, we have no choice.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv, can you explain?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Rightâ€”we can force a sleep command from inside Karenina's M.I.N.D. by connecting with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Specifically, by using my operation system as a bridge to connect Karenina and someone else's M.I.N.D., we can let the two consciousnesses briefly connect.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That way, the other person can enter Karenina's M.I.N.D. and assist in forcing a sleep command.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "So it'll be like injecting immunocytes into a body?", 4: '3'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes, Lee's metaphor is quite apt. But at the same time, this requires the linking of two M.I.N.D.s, so there will be a high chance of coming into contact with that unknown energy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sorry... but I have no suitable countermeasures at the moment.", 4: '1'}
{2: "No, you've already done well, Liv.", 3: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll take that risk for Karen.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No, I should do it.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Currently, we'll have to stay here for an unknown period of time. The Corrupted might attack, and whether it be defending or attacking, long-ranged support will be better than melee for holding our position.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "And we have the guidance of Commandant's Mind Beacon. That should lower the risk.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Okay, but be careful... I'll leave Karenina in your hands.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, help Bianca protect both Commandant and Liv.', 4: '2'}
